explanation: Based on your tests, your tubes are open and sperm count is decent. IUI is a good 'stepping stone'. It places washed sperm directly inside the uterus, bypassing the cervix.
next_steps: I recommend trying 3 cycles of IUI. If not successful, we move to IVF.
reassurance: It is much less invasive and less expensive than IVF, though the success rate is lower (15-20% per cycle).
call_to_action: Shall we start with your next period?

explanation: Since your age is <35 and AMH is good, IUI is the logical first step. It boosts natural conception.
next_steps: Call us on Day 1 of your period to start Letrozole tablets.
reassurance: Many couples succeed with just this little push!

explanation: Aapki reports normal hain, isliye hum seedha IVF nahi karenge. Pehle IUI try karte hain.
next_steps: Isme injections kam lagte hain aur kharcha bhi kam hai.
reassurance: Agar 3 baar mein IUI work nahi kiya, tabhi hum IVF sochenge.

explanation: Sperm count is 15 Million (Mild Low). IUI is perfect for this.
next_steps: We will 'Wash' the sperm to concentrate only the fast-moving ones.
reassurance: Washing can improve motility significantly for the procedure.

explanation: The count is slightly below average. Natural conception might take years, but IUI speeds it up by getting sperm closer to the egg.
next_steps: We need a fresh sample on the day of IUI.
reassurance: This is a very common indication for IUI.

explanation: The total motile count is less than 5 Million. IUI has a very low success rate in this range (<5%).
next_steps: I strongly recommend skipping IUI and going to IVF-ICSI.
reassurance: I don't want you to waste money on IUI cycles that likely won't work.

explanation: With severe male factor, IUI is rarely successful. The sperm simply can't swim to the tube.
next_steps: ICSI (injecting sperm into egg) is the solution.
reassurance: We want to give you the best chance per rupee spent.

explanation: All tests are normal, but pregnancy isn't happening. IUI with super-ovulation (making 2 eggs) increases odds.
next_steps: Plan: 3-4 cycles of IUI.
reassurance: Sometimes the sperm just needs a 'lift' to the destination.

explanation: Isse 'Unexplained Infertility' kehte hain. IUI best starting point hai.
next_steps: Hum 2 eggs banane ki koshish karenge tablets se.
reassurance: Normal couples mein bhi kabhi kabhi time lagta hai.

explanation: Since we can't find a cause, we treat empirically. IUI + Clomid increases monthly chance from 3% to 15%.
next_steps: Let's try this for 3 months max.

explanation: With PCOS, you don't ovulate regularly. IUI ensures we time the sperm exactly when the egg releases.
next_steps: Medication: Letrozole (better for PCOS than Clomid).
reassurance: PCOS patients often have great success with IUI because 'Ovulation' was the only missing piece.

explanation: We need to make you ovulate. We will use tablets.
next_steps: Monitoring is key to ensure we don't make TOO many eggs (risk of twins).
reassurance: You have plenty of eggs, we just need to release one.

explanation: Since you ovulate perfectly on your own, we won't use stimulation drugs.
next_steps: Just tracking the natural follicle and timing the IUI.

explanation: Bina kisi injection ke IUI karenge. Aapka ovulation natural hai.
next_steps: Sirf scan karke timing match karenge.
reassurance: Body pe koi load nahi padega.

explanation: We will just use a trigger shot to be precise, but no fertility pills.
next_steps: Call us when you get a positive LH kit or come Day 10.

explanation: Take Clomiphene 50mg x 5 days (Day 2-6).
next_steps: Scan on Day 9.

explanation: Clomid tablet roz raat ko leni hai 5 din tak.
next_steps: Isse 2-3 eggs banenge.
reassurance: Thoda mood swing ho sakta hai, normal hai.

explanation: Goal: Recruit 2 follicles.
next_steps: Taken orally Day 2-6.

explanation: Take Letrozole 2.5mg (2 tablets) daily.
next_steps: It has fewer side effects than Clomid and lining thickness is usually better.

explanation: Ye tablet PCOS ke liye best hai. Lining patli nahi hoti.
next_steps: 5 din ka course hai.
reassurance: Single dominant follicle banne ke chance zyada hain (twins risk kam).

explanation: Tablets didn't work, so we are using low-dose FSH injections (75 IU).
next_steps: Daily injection in tummy.

explanation: This increases the cost but also the success rate.
next_steps: We must monitor very closely to avoid triplets.

explanation: Hum halki dose ke injections shuru kar rahe hain.
next_steps: Roz clinic aana pad sakta hai ya ghar pe lagayein.

explanation: Clomid + 2 Injections.
next_steps: Best of both worlds: Cost effective + Boost.

explanation: We will combine tablets and a small boost of injection on Day 7 & 9.
next_steps: This helps the lining and follicle quality.

explanation: Follicles are currently {{size}}mm (Target 18mm). Growing a bit slowly.
next_steps: Come back in 3 days. Continue meds.

explanation: Eggs abhi chhote hain (12mm). 2-3 din aur lagenge.
next_steps: Injection dose same rakhein.
reassurance: Ghabrayein nahi, late ovulation normal hai.

explanation: Not ready yet. We need them to reach 18mm to ensure maturity.
next_steps: Extend stimulation.

explanation: Lead follicle is **{{size}}mm**! Lining is perfect.
next_steps: Trigger Shot tonight at {{trigger_time}}. IUI scheduled for {{transfer_date}}.

explanation: Trigger tonight {{trigger_time}}.
next_steps: IUI on {{transfer_date}} morning.

explanation: Follicle {{size}}mm ka ho gaya hai. Aaj raat Trigger injection lijiye.
next_steps: Parso IUI hoga.

explanation: Scan shows you have already ovulated naturally (follicle ruptured).
next_steps: We will do the IUI **TODAY** immediately to catch the egg.
reassurance: Egg survives 12-24 hours. We are still in the window!

explanation: The egg has released. We cannot wait for tomorrow.
next_steps: Can your husband come within 1 hour?
reassurance: Immediate IUI gives us a chance.

explanation: You have 5 large follicles. If we do IUI, there is a high risk of triplets or quadruplets.
next_steps: I advise cancelling the IUI and advising abstinence (no sex) OR converting to IVF to collect them.
reassurance: Multiple pregnancy is dangerous for you.

explanation: Risk of high-order multiples. We cannot proceed with IUI.
next_steps: Please use protection this month.
reassurance: It means you respond well, just too well.

explanation: Bohot zyada eggs (5+) ban gaye hain. IUI karna safe nahi hai (Triplets ho sakte hain).
next_steps: Cycle cancel karni padegi.

explanation: One beautiful {{size}}mm follicle. This is the ideal scenario for a singleton pregnancy.
next_steps: Trigger tonight.

explanation: Ek achha follicle hai ({{size}}mm).
next_steps: Safe IUI ke liye best hai.

explanation: Please provide semen sample at {{sample_time}} on IUI day.
next_steps: Abstinence: 2-5 days (Not more, not less).

explanation: Fresh sample needed at {{sample_time}}.
next_steps: 2-3 days abstinence ideal.

explanation:
Sample looks good! 
Post-wash count: **{{count}} Million** 
Motility: **{{motility}}%**
next_steps: We are loading the catheter now.
reassurance: Anything >5 Million post-wash is excellent for IUI.

explanation: The wash yielded {{count}} million motile sperm. This gives us a good fighting chance.
next_steps: Proceeding.

explanation: Wash karne ke baad {{count}} million achhe sperm mile hain.
next_steps: IUI ke liye kaafi hai.

explanation: Post-wash count is very low (1 Million). IUI might not work.
next_steps: We can proceed since you are prepped, but chances are slim. Or we cancel.
call_to_action: Do you want to proceed anyway?

explanation: Count lower than expected. Proceeding with IUI but wanted to inform you.
next_steps: If this fails, next step is IVF.

explanation: IUI is quick (5 mins). Speculum inserted (like Pap smear), thin tube passes cervix.
next_steps: Full bladder helps straighten the uterus.

explanation: Sirf 5 minute lagenge. Dard nahi hota, bas halka sa pressure feel hoga.
next_steps: Relax rahein.

explanation: A little pink discharge is normal. It's from the cervix, not the uterus.
next_steps: Wear a panty liner.
reassurance: It does not mean the sperm fell out!

explanation: Thoda blood aana normal hai catheter ki wajah se.
next_steps: Daro mat.

explanation: Beta hCG: **{{beta_value}}**. It worked!
next_steps: Progesterone continue karein.

explanation: You are pregnant! The IUI was successful.
next_steps: This is just the start. Medications are crucial now.

explanation: IUI successful raha! Aap pregnant hain.
next_steps: Davai band mat karna galti se bhi.

explanation: Beta is negative (<5). I know this is disappointing.
next_steps: Success rate is cumulative. 2nd or 3rd cycle often works.
reassurance: Your body responded well, it just didn't click this time.

explanation: Negative this time. But remember, even nature only has a 20% chance per month.
next_steps: Let's try again. We might increase the dose slightly.
reassurance: Most IUI pregnancies happen in first 3 tries.

explanation: Test negative aaya hai. Par ye pehla hi attempt tha.
next_steps: Period aane dein. Phir dubara try karenge.

explanation: This was our 3rd IUI failure. Statistically, doing more IUIs has low yield.
next_steps: It is time to discuss IVF where we can ensure fertilization happens.
reassurance: We tried the simple way. Now we need the advanced way.

explanation: Since 3 cycles failed, we should upgrade to IVF. Success rates jump from 15% to 50%.
next_steps: Let's review the plan.
reassurance: IUI was a good diagnostic test, even if it didn't result in baby.

explanation: We see TWO sacs! The stimulation worked very well.
next_steps: Twin pregnancy requires extra care.
